snippet: The death of an Indian woman who was denied an abortion in Ireland last month during a long miscarriage prompted more than a thousand protesters to rally outside the Irish Parliament in Dublin on Wednesday night.
abstract: The death of an Indian woman who was denied an abortion in Ireland last month during a long miscarriage prompted more than a thousand protesters to rally outside the Irish Parliament in Dublin on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Vigils in Ireland for Indian Woman Who Died After Being Denied Abortion
